name: Cursor Visual Editor
description: A visual drag-and-drop design editor integrated into Cursor's AI-powered IDE that allows developers and designers to visually edit web applications with real-time code updates, similar to Chrome DevTools with enhanced AI capabilities.
community_quotes: Ranked #2 Product of the Day on Product Hunt
Clean UI/UX and top-notch AI integration - feels like pair programming
Can fix tiny layout annoyances without begging AI to not wreck your file

name: Letta Code
description: A memory-first CLI coding agent that maintains persistent agent state across sessions, learns from experience through skill acquisition, and ranks #1 as model-agnostic open-source harness on Terminal-Bench with 42.5% overall score.
community_quotes: #1 model-agnostic open-source agent on Terminal-Bench
Agents that learn your code - fun to play with
Achieves comparable performance to provider-specific harnesses like Claude Code and Gemini CLI

name: Google Opal
description: A vibe-coding tool integrated into Gemini web app that allows users to build AI-powered mini-apps called Gems through natural language descriptions with a visual editor for no-code app creation, currently free during experimental beta.
community_quotes: Part of Google's 'no-code revolution'
Good for scaffolding and quick prototyping
Struggles with conversational features in complex applications

name: GPT-5.2-Codex
description: OpenAI's most advanced agentic coding model focused on professional software engineering and defensive cybersecurity with SWE-Bench Pro score of 56.4%, optimized for large code changes including repository-scale refactors and cross-module migrations.
community_quotes: Best model out there - handles both backend and frontend work
So good at finding bugs and little inconsistencies, it's astounding
Developers report relying completely on Codex for code reviews

name: Junie by JetBrains
description: JetBrains' AI coding agent plugin that handles tasks autonomously or in collaboration with developers, featuring configurable command execution and agentic AI capabilities with spec-driven approach for coding.
community_quotes: One of the best coding agents - very well integrated with IntelliJ
Great for Kotlin development
Only works with IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate, not Community Edition

name: Verdent AI Desktop App
description: Major updates to standalone desktop app enabling parallel task execution with context preservation across multiple concurrent coding tasks, deploying multiple agents simultaneously like a coordinated micro-team for 10x faster project cycles.
community_quotes: Functions like a coordinated micro-team of agents
Context preservation across multiple concurrent coding tasks
10x faster complex project cycles

name: MiniMax M2.1
description: A multilingual AI coding model optimized for various programming tools and agent frameworks with SWE-bench Verified score of 74.0%, designed for agentic coding with enhanced long-horizon reasoning and multi-file editing capabilities.
community_quotes: Straight up beast at UI/UX design
Using M2.1 full-time as a developer - purely for writing code
Outperforms Claude Sonnet 4.5 in multilingual scenarios
74.0% on SWE-bench Verified - significant prowess in software engineering
